Class Choice

java.lang.Object
  Choice

public class Choice
extends java.lang.Object

The Choice class represents a choice made by the player or the computer. It can be either "rock", "paper", or "scissors".

Method Detail

compareWith

public int compareWith(Choice anotherChoice)
Compare "this" with anotherChoice

Parameters:
anotherChoice - the choice to be compared
Returns:
either 1, -1, or 0 which indicates the comparison result: 1 means "this" wins anotherChoice; -1 means "this" loses to anotherChoice; 0 means "this" and anotherChoice are the same

draw

public void draw(comp102x.Canvas canvas,
                 int x,
                 int y,

Draw the choice image (rock/paper/scissors) on the given canvas

Parameters:
canvas - the canvas to draw on
x - the x-position of the choice image to be drawn
y - the y-position of the choice image to be drawn
rotation - the rotation of the choice image to be drawn

getType

public int getType()
Get a number that represents the choice type

Returns:
a number that represents the choice type: 0=rock, 1=paper, 2=scissors
